TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit RSAKeyValue extends System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.KeyInfoClause

summary.span: 代表 XML 簽章的 <> 項目。

span.span: Represents the <> element of an XML signature.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 類別代表``XML 簽章 XML 數位簽章規格所定義的項目。The class represents the `` element of an XML signature defined by the XML digital signature specification. ``項目是子元素``項目 (由類別)，描述公開金鑰。The `` element is the subelement of the `` element (represented by the class) that describes an public key. ``項目包含對應至用來數位簽署文件的私用金鑰的公開金鑰。The `` element contains the public key that corresponds to the private key used to digitally sign a document. 文件的收件者會使用公開金鑰來驗證 XML 簽章。A recipient of the document uses the public key to validate the XML signature. 使用類別，每當您想要將公開金鑰新增至您的 XML 數位簽章。Use the class whenever you want to add a public key to your XML digital signature. 如果金鑰未明確提供給建構函式中，新隨機產生金鑰組。If a key is not explicitly supplied to the constructor, a new key pair is randomly generated. 如需詳細資訊``項目，請參閱 W3C 規格 www.w3.org/TR/xmldsig-core/。For more information about the `` element, see the W3C specification at www.w3.org/TR/xmldsig-core/. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何產生及驗證信封的 XML 簽章使用物件。The following code example demonstrates how to generate and verify an enveloped XML signature using the object. [!code-cpp[System.Security.Cryptography.XML-XMLDsigEnvelope#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Security.Cryptography.XML-XMLDsigEnvelope/CPP/xmldsigenv.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[System.Security.Cryptography.XML-XMLDsigEnvelope#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Security.Cryptography.XML-XMLDsigEnvelope/CS/xmldsigenv.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Security.Cryptography.XML-XMLDsigEnvelope#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Security.Cryptography.XML-XMLDsigEnvelope/VB/xmldsigenv.vb#1)] 下列程式碼範例示範如何產生，並確認已中斷連結的 XML 簽章使用物件。The following code example demonstrates how to generate and verify a detached XML signature using the object. [!code-cpp[System.Security.Cryptography.XML-XMLDsigDetached#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Security.Cryptography.XML-XMLDsigDetached/CPP/xmldsigdetach.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[System.Security.Cryptography.XML-XMLDsigDetached#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Security.Cryptography.XML-XMLDsigDetached/CS/xmldsigdetach.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Security.Cryptography.XML-XMLDsigDetached#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Security.Cryptography.XML-XMLDsigDetached/VB/xmldsigdetach.vb#1)]

summary.span: 使用隨機產生的新 公開金鑰，初始化 類別的新執行個體。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class with a new randomly generated public key.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個建構函式建立的預設實作的新執行個體来保存的公開金鑰。This constructor creates a new instance of the default implementation of to hold the public key.

remarks.format: ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何產生及驗證信封的 XML 簽章使用物件。The following code example demonstrates how to generate and verify an enveloped XML signature using the object. [!code-cpp[System.Security.Cryptography.XML-XMLDsigEnvelope#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Security.Cryptography.XML-XMLDsigEnvelope/CPP/xmldsigenv.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[System.Security.Cryptography.XML-XMLDsigEnvelope#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Security.Cryptography.XML-XMLDsigEnvelope/CS/xmldsigenv.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Security.Cryptography.XML-XMLDsigEnvelope#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Security.Cryptography.XML-XMLDsigEnvelope/VB/xmldsigenv.vb#1)] 下列程式碼範例示範如何產生，並確認已中斷連結的 XML 簽章使用物件。The following code example demonstrates how to generate and verify a detached XML signature using the object. [!code-cpp[System.Security.Cryptography.XML-XMLDsigDetached#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Security.Cryptography.XML-XMLDsigDetached/CPP/xmldsigdetach.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[System.Security.Cryptography.XML-XMLDsigDetached#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Security.Cryptography.XML-XMLDsigDetached/CS/xmldsigdetach.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Security.Cryptography.XML-XMLDsigDetached#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Security.Cryptography.XML-XMLDsigDetached/VB/xmldsigdetach.vb#1)]

remarks.format: 根據[RSAKeyValue 元素](https://www.w3.org/TR/2002/REC-xmldsig-core-20020212/#sec-RSAKeyValue)W3C 建議事項[XML 簽章語法和處理版本 1.0](https://www.w3.org/TR/2002/REC-xmldsig-core-20020212)。Based upon [The RSAKeyValue Element](https://www.w3.org/TR/2002/REC-xmldsig-core-20020212/#sec-RSAKeyValue) in the W3C Recommendation [XML Signature Syntax and Processing Version 1.0](https://www.w3.org/TR/2002/REC-xmldsig-core-20020212).

span.span: The instance of that holds the public key.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 屬性表示要加入 XML 數位簽章使用的公開金鑰``子項目並``的子元素``項目。The property represents the public key to add to an XML digital signature using the `` subelement and the `` subelement of the `` element. 如需有關 XML 數位簽章的詳細資訊，請參閱 www.w3.org/TR/xmldsig-core/ 的 W3C 規格。For more information about XML digital signatures, see the W3C specification at www.w3.org/TR/xmldsig-core/.

remarks.format: 根據[RSAKeyValue 元素](https://www.w3.org/TR/2002/REC-xmldsig-core-20020212/#sec-RSAKeyValue)W3C 建議事項[XML 簽章語法和處理版本 1.0](https://www.w3.org/TR/2002/REC-xmldsig-core-20020212)。Based upon [The RSAKeyValue Element](https://www.w3.org/TR/2002/REC-xmldsig-core-20020212/#sec-RSAKeyValue) in the W3C Recommendation [XML Signature Syntax and Processing Version 1.0](https://www.w3.org/TR/2002/REC-xmldsig-core-20020212).
